mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (ID, PWD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, EMAIL, GENDER, AGE, FAV, JOINDATE, LOGINDATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNick}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress}, #{userEmail}, #{gender}, #{userAge}, #{userFav}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM USERS WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT count(*) FROM USERS WHERE nickname = #{userNick}
SELECT count(*) FROM USERS WHERE email = #{userEmail}
SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{userId} AND PWD = #{userPwd}
SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE NAME = #{userName} AND EMAIL = #{userEmail}
SELECT ID FROM USERS WHERE NAME = #{userName} AND EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND PHONE = #{userPhone}
SELECT PWD FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{userId} AND EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND PHONE = #{userPhone}
SELECT O.ORDERNO, F.FUNDINGNO, O.ID, F.FUNDINGTITLE, F.MAKER, O.ORDERDATE FROM FUNDING F JOIN ORDERS O ON F.FUNDINGNO = O.FUNDINGNO WHERE O.ID = #{userId} ORDER BY ORDERDATE

SELECT O.ORDERNO, F.FUNDINGNO, O.ID, F.FUNDINGTITLE, F.MAKER, O.ORDERDATE FROM FUNDING F JOIN ORDERS O ON F.FUNDINGNO = O.FUNDINGNO WHERE O.ID = #{userId} AND F.FUNDINGNO = #{fundingNo} ORDER BY ORDERDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT F.FUNDINGTITLE, F.MAKER, O.ORDERDATE, O.ID FROM FUNDING F JOIN ORDERS O ON F.FUNDINGNO = O.FUNDINGNO WHERE O.ID = #{userId})

SELECT B.FUNDINGNO, R.REWARDTITLE, R.REWARDPRICE, B.REWARDCOUNT, B.REWARDPRICE AS RTOTALPRICE, B.ORDERNO, B.ORDERDETAILNO FROM REWARD R JOIN ( SELECT O.FUNDINGNO, O.ID, D.REWARDNO, D.REWARDPRICE, D.REWARDCOUNT, D.ORDERNO, D.ORDERDETAILNO FROM ORDERS O JOIN ORDERSDETAIL D ON O.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO WHERE O.ID = #{userId} ) B ON R.REWARDNO = B.REWARDNO
SELECT MAKER FROM MAKER WHERE MAKER = #{maker}
